p: The azo colors are compounds bearing the functional group R-N = N-R′, where R and R′ may be either aryl or alkyl. Azo dyes are one of the most important chemical categories of dyes which are used for the coloring of natural and synthetic fibers, candies, and cosmetics but also food and beverages [ 20, 21]. Many azo dyes are nontoxic, although some of them have been accused for allergic reactions and increasing hyperactivity in children [ 22].
